channel.title: [PJA] MySql error
channel.description:
Hey, I've tried to import Mysql Saving/Loading to PJA, and now I'm getting those errors what does they mean.
[code]INFO: Ready java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.mysql.jdbc.Driver at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Class.forName0(Native Method) at java.lang.Class.forName(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.rs2.net.DatabaseManager.driverTest(DatabaseManager.java:27) at org.hyperion.rs2.net.DatabaseManager.<clinit>(DatabaseManager.java:17) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World.init(World.java:239) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.<init>(RS2Server.java:48) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Dec 8, 2011 4:25:20 PM org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.lang.NullPointerException at org.hyperion.rs2.net.DatabaseManager.<init>(DatabaseManager.java:21) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World.init(World.java:239) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.<init>(RS2Server.java:48) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) [/code]

item.title: [PJA] MySql error
item.dc:creator: @addinol addinol
item.description:
@addinol wrote:

Hey, I’ve tried to import Mysql Saving/Loading to PJA, and now I’m getting those errors what does they mean.
